wordGroup: healthy lifestyle 健康的生活方式

sentences.en: They lived a very lavish lifestyle.
sentences.cn: 他们过着挥霍无度的生活。

sentences.en: Many people thrive on a stressful lifestyle.
sentences.cn: 许多人喜欢有压力的生活方式。

sentences.en: Her lifestyle was out of kilter with her politics.
sentences.cn: 她的生活方式与她的政治活动格格不入。
